verses.name: Job 17:1
verses.text: My breath is corrupt, my days are extinct, the graves are ready for me.

verses.name: Job 17:2
verses.text: Are there not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation?

verses.name: Job 17:3
verses.text: Lay down now, put me in a surety with thee; who is he that will strike hands with me?

verses.name: Job 17:4
verses.text: For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt them.

verses.name: Job 17:5
verses.text: He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.

verses.name: Job 17:6
verses.text: He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret.
